name: get_auto_suggestion
description: Get auto complete suggestions by name or ingredients.

prefix.description: The name or ingredients to search for.

name: get_recipes
description: List recipes by option filters or name.

from_.description: The offset of items to be ignored in response for paging.

size.description: Number of items returned per response.

q.description: Name of food or, ingredients to search by.

sort.description: Leave empty to sort by popular as default OR one of the following : approved_at:desc|approved_at:asc.

name: get_similar_recipes
description: List similar recipes by recipe id.

id.description: The id of the recipe to get similar recipes for.

name: get_more_info
description: Get more information about a recipe by id.

id.description: The id of the recipe to get more information about.

name: load_tips
description: Load tips for a recipe by id.

id.description: The id of the recipe to load tips for.

from_.description: The offset of items to be ignored in response for paging.

size.description: Number of items returned per response.

name: list_feeds
description: List latest feeds about new food, recipes, etc.

from_.description: The offset of items to be ignored in response for paging.

size.description: Number of items returned per response.

timezone.description: The timezone of your location in format of +/- hhmm.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
